channel.title: Error?
channel.description:
Everytime i click the "Runserver" button i get "'java' is no recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue. . .
anyone know whats wrong? dont flame me please.
let me know what i should do

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @Kevy_Wevy Kevy Wevy
item.description:
@Kevy_Wevy wrote:

i am following a tutorial

and @ sabotage i got “JDK 6 Update 7”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2008, 06:24:28 pm[/size][hr]what do i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

NOT AGAIN! (not flamming but come on)
people ask this question about 16 times a day…
you need to follow a tutorial on how to host a server…or how to make a server…one is stickey’d on the tutorial page as soon as i found this site awhile ago that’s the first thing i read…

Read full topic

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @sabotage sabotage
item.description:
@sabotage wrote:

Download the latest Java, and make sure that the correct version is in your run.bat when you click edit.

Read full topic
